data.title: Under the Domim Tree

Description

Chronicles the joys and troubles experienced by a group of teenagers, mostly Holocaust survivors, living at an Israeli youth settlement in 1953 Read More

In a youth village on Israel's coastal plain, just after World War II, Aviya and her friends, Yola and Mira, share the common sorrow of longing for lost families and struggle together to make new lives for themselves. Read Less
